page.title: 02HOUSING IN RAMSBOTTOM AREA.
page.content: The 19th.century{stone cottage}is the main type of {housing}in Ramsbottom and these are found in straight, parallel streets on the sides of the {Irwell valley.} Eg.For Sale.Victoria Street.Ramsbottom Stone mid-terraced with gas central heating.Vestibule,lounge,kitchen,2 bedrooms,bathroom. In contrast,housing in Greenmount, Hawkshaw,Holcombe Brook,and Summerseat is found on modern post- war {housing-estates}with curved drives,cul-de-sacs and avenues. Eg.Bolton Road West,Holcombe Brook. Enjoying panoramic views to rear over countryside and Holcombe Hill detached house of character.House comprises lounge, dining-room,fitted kitchen, 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms,double garage,gardens front and rear.
